headline.print_headline: Russia Appeals Ban of Track and Field Team
headline.main: Russia Appeals Doping Ban to International Sports Court

snippet: The appeal will be heard by the Court of Arbitration for Sport on July 19. The Russian Olympic Committee said it would extend the deadline for application to the Olympics if it succeeds....
lead_paragraph: The appeal will be heard by the Court of Arbitration for Sport on July 19. The Russian Olympic Committee said it would extend the deadline for application to the Olympics if it succeeds.
